item.description: class: center middle How to use pi camera with buttons and LED CyrusN Recipe Raspberry Pi Keyboard and mouse Power cable HDMI cable Ethernet cable Pi Camera Mini Breadboard LED light bulb 330 ohms resistor x 1 Male to female dupont wires x 6 Male to male dupont wires x 2 Reference gpiozero — Gpiozero 1.4.1 Documentation picamera — Picamera 1.13 Documentation class: center .
